content: **knitted mittens in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked in stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #mutedtouchmittens drops design pattern me-297 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl circumference 17-18-19 cm length 23-24½-25½ cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 54 morning fog **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
